mapper.select: SELECT tu.*, tp.permission_name FROM quiz.t_user AS tu left join quiz.t_user_roles AS tur ON tu.user_id = tur.user_id left JOIN quiz.t_role AS tr ON tr.role_id = tur.role_id left JOIN quiz.t_role_permissions AS trp ON tr.role_id = trp.role_id left JOIN quiz.t_permission AS tp ON tp.permission_id = trp.permission_id WHERE tu.username = #{account} or tu.mail = #{account} or tu.phone = #{account}
select tu.* from quiz.t_user_auth tua left join quiz.t_user tu on tua.user_id = tu.user_id where tua.provider_id = #{providerId}

select tu.*, sum(qa.score) as total_score from quiz.q_paper qp left join quiz.q_answer qa on qp.paper_id = qa.paper_id left join quiz.t_user tu on qa.responder_user_id = tu.user_id
where qp.state != -1 and qp.creator_user_id = #{userId} and qa.responder_user_id is not null group by tu.user_id order by total_score desc;

select tu.*, count(distinct qp.paper_id) as paper_total, count(distinct qa.answer_id) as answer_total, count(distinct qa2.responder_user_id) as intimate_friend_total from quiz.t_user tu left join quiz.q_paper qp on tu.user_id = qp.creator_user_id # 我的出题 left join quiz.q_answer qa on tu.user_id = qa.responder_user_id # 我的答题 left join quiz.q_answer qa2 on qp.paper_id = qa2.paper_id and qa2.score = 100 # 做我的试卷,得分100分的 where tu.user_id = #{userId} group by tu.user_id
